Malice:  "Blacknightmare?  What will Hellplague do if she is given the choi=
ce to come with us?"
Blacknightamre: "I don't know"said soflty the femme"Sh=
e may come with us or she would rather remain here..."
Malice:  The male fe=
ll silent, deep in thought.  it bothered him, they were close, he did not w=
ant to leave her alone.
Blacknightmare: the femme sat down near him and sai=
d while he touched glenty his hand "It's all ok?, is that stopping you to c=
all your sister?"
Malice:  "No, I just worry about her.  I worry, what will=
 happen to her when we leave."
Blacknightmare:  "I won't leave her alone...=
 you and she are the only family that I have"
Malice:  "I hope it doesn't c=
ome to that.  But I don't know if the Maximals will accept her, I can only =
force my point so far, they may not go for it."
Blacknightmare: "If they do=
n't accept her.. then they not would accept me..."
Malice:  We'll have to t=
ry."
Blacknightmare: "yes.."said softly the femme"We have to try... when yo=
u're ready, we can get contact with them..."
Malice:  "We'll call later, on=
ce everyone is rested.  They may not be too happy, but we should prepare, j=
ust in case."
Bllacknightamare: "Why they won't be happy to see you again?"=
said confused the femme
Malice;  "Because, they usually won't trust someone=
 who fought against them, they have always been that way."
Blacknightmare: =
"You couldn't avoid it..."replied the femme"You were brainwashed"
Malice:  =
He did not say anything, he was too worried, that he may be right.  But he =
had to try.  He had to see his sister at least one last time.
Blacknightmar=
e: the femme didn't say anithing and huged Malice
Malice:  "We'll worry whe=
n the time comes.  Right now, let's just enjoy ourselves."  He smiled and h=
ugged her back, where would he be without her?
Blacknightmare: The femme hu=
ged back and smiled "I just want your happines.."
Malice:  "I want to make =
everyone happy, but it seems I may not be able to.  But we musat hope for t=
he best."
Blacknightmare: "yes we do"replied the femme with a smile "Is Org=
anics your only relative or du you have more sisters or brothers?"
Malice: =
 "I have a brother.  One who is no longer with us.  Unless sparks can rise =
from the dead.  he's been dead for a long time, but I feel his spirit alway=
s, that same burning fire..."
lacknightmare: "A brother??? how was he like?=
"
Malice:  "He was strong.  Everyone I knew looked up to him.  He was proud=
, Nd strong, and always there for us.  Until..."
Blacknightmare: The femme =
tocuhed glenty Malice's hand
[23:28] bustercross365: Malice:  "He was taken=
 away, twisted and perverted into a killer.  That day his spirit was gone, =
and a few milleniea later, his body was put to rest."  It hurt, but she wou=
ld find out anyway.
[23:30] airly2000: Blacknightmare:The femme said sadly =
"Sorry, I didn't like to... make you remember that..."
[23:31] bustercross3=
65: Malice:  "No, it's okay.  He's in a happier place I suppose, I can't fe=
el bad about."
[23:32] airly2000: Blacknightmare: the femme fell in silcenc=
e and didn't know what to say
[23:33] bustercross365: Malice:  "DOn't be so=
 glum.  Megatron can't come back, unless Primus wishes it.  So I don't thin=
k you have a problem.  Though I wish we could meet, just for once..."
[23:3=
4] airly2000: Blacknightmare: "Megatron??? is he your Bro?"
[23:37] busterc=
ross365: Malice:  "He was.  Quite a family i have, huh?"
[23:38] airly2000:=
 Blacknightmare:  the femme smiled shyly and replied "Perhaps you"
[23:39] =
airly2000: "Well it's a good luck that Unicron hadn't knew that... He doesn=
't aprreciate Megatron"
[23:40] bustercross365: Malice:  "I wouldn't think =
so.  They did have a rough start, but that was over pretty quickly.  Thank =
goodness for that."
[23:41] airly2000: Blacknightmare: "You're right... but=
 I looked a bot in Cannon's battle that if he isn't MEgatron, he looked as =
him"
[23:42] bustercross365: Malice:  "What?  that's impossible!  He's dead=
!"  He could barely try to believe it, it was too absurd.
[23:43] airly2000=
: Blacknightmare "I saw that bot  battling against  Nightstrike... "
[23:44=
] bustercross365: Malice:  "It has to be a look alike.  I *know* he is dead=
, there is just no way..."
[23:44] airly2000: Blacknightmare
[23:45] airly2=
000: Blacknightmare: "We should find out about ...  I've seen a lot strange=
 things while I was traveling with Minions... and I learned that all could =
happen"
[23:46] bustercross365: Malice:  The male sat silent, it sounded to=
o incredible.  "I don't know..."
[23:47] airly2000: Blacknightmare;: "We sh=
ould try... we haven't anything to loose"
[23:48] bustercross365: Malice:  =
"...Maybe.  We'll try after we resolve the issue of going to the Maximals. =
 One thng at a time."
[23:49] airly2000: Blacknightmare: the femme nodded "=
Should we try to contact them using your conlink or try a personal contact?=
"
[23:51] bustercross365: Malice: "Let's try the ship's transmitter.  It sh=
ould still work..."  Malice begins typing on a panel, then sighs.  "It will=
 take a little while for it to descramble, the interferance had a lasting a=
ffect on it."
[23:53] airly2000: Blacknightmare: the femme looked and thoug=
ht that the moment had come
[23:55] bustercross365: Malice:  "Okay, I guess=
 we'll have to give it a try."  He opens a channel and first there is stati=
c, but it clears up.  "Maximal base, this is Malice, come in."
[23:59] airl=
y2000: Kup picked the comlinks and fought with Stacit "Ma..... where..... a=
re you.......?"
[00:00] bustercross365: Malice:  "Hold on, let me boost the=
 signal gain."  he transfers more power to the high gain antennae, and the =
static clears.  "Kup?  Malice here.  I'm back."
[00:02] airly2000: Kup/elit=
a: "MALICE it's ityou???? calm down Elita don't play with the control panel=
"said Kup while he tried to hold contact and avoid that Elita pressed some =
buttons 
[00:03] bustercross365: Malice:  you sound suprised.  Did you actu=
ally think I couldn't get back here?  You ought to know better."
[00:05] ai=
rly2000: Kup/Elita: "We're supposing trying to bring you back to base... No=
 Elita don't play with that"The little child protested a loud  while Kup tr=
ied to caml her down"Organics is worried about you"
[00:07] bustercross365:=
 Malice:  "Organics..." he said, looking over to Blacknightmare.  He sighed=
 a little, then turned back to the comm.  "How is she?"
[00:12] airly2000: =
Kup: "she's fine, The las time that I saw her, Elita please, can't you be q=
uiet  a shor while?"The baby girld giggles and kupsaid by com link "Sorry, =
I'm caring Elita a while... AS I told you, She's ok, somehow... Pretty worr=
ied about you when she looked you in the battle in Cannon, She was set in s=
tasis by one of the minions, I don't know who, but now she's fine... We als=
o has an unusual visit, Megatron,  Organics said that he was her brother so=
 Rodimus let him come in.... "
[00:13] bustercross365: Malice:  "How?  Mega=
tron is dead!  This has to be a trick!"
[00:15] airly2000: Kup: "Your sis s=
aid that he is your and her brother... How could be that it's mysteri for m=
e"replied Kup "and by now he hadn't done troubles "
[00:16] bustercross365:=
 Malice:  "I have to see this for myself.  Where is he?"  He looked over to=
 Blacknightmare, a look of worry on his face.
[00:19] airly2000: Blacknight=
mare/Kup: Te femme took malice's hand, while Kup replied by comlink  "He's =
somewhere in base... wait me a sec... and he will be in com link..."
[00:20=
] airly2000: Kup: Kupe opened com lin kw it MEgatron and said "MEgatron... =
You may not baelive this, but Malice is in comlink... he wants' speak with =
ya..."
[00:22] bustercross365: Megatron Revived:  "What?" the clone thunder=
ed into his comm link.  "This had better not be a trick!"
[00:23] airly2000=
: Kup: "I never would do a joke about this... I would try to get a image of=
 Malice... come to control room"
[00:24] bustercross365: Megatron Revived: =
 The clone went inside, and shortly found the room.  "Where is he?  Where i=
s Malice?"
[00:26] airly2000: Kup: "I got a comlink with him.... He still i=
s line... and he belives that you're dead"said the male while he tried to c=
aml down Elita :D
[00:27] bustercross365: Malice:  "Megatron?  Is that you?=
"
[00:28] bustercross365: Megatron Revived:  He activates the visual feed, =
and once the visual is established, there is absolute quiet between the two=
 brothers.
[00:29] airly2000: Kup/Elita: Elita started play with Kup whiel =
the male looked hima ns said "What's goin on, Megaron?"
[00:30] bustercross=
365: Megatron Revived:  "Malice.... it has been so long...."
[00:30] buster=
cross365: Malice:  "How?  I thought you were dead!"
[00:31] bustercross365:=
 Megatron Revived:  "I was, and am. I am a cloned spark and body, but I hav=
e all the memories of the original before that day..."
[00:32] bustercross3=
65: Malice:  "I understand.... Brother."
[00:33] airly2000: Blacknightmare;=
  "What's goin on?"said the femme to Malice in a low voice
[00:34] bustercr=
oss365: Malice:  "It is my brother, he is alive..."
[00:38] airly2000: Blac=
knightmare:: "So I saw him?"
[00:38] bustercross365: Malice:  "I guess so..=
."

asked, a little concerned.
[00:39] airly2000: Blacknightmare:  "You have to=
 told him... about what happened with you"said softly the femme+
